comments: Ball (CHA) maintains a legal guarding position on Anunoby (TOR) and cleanly deflects the pass away.  After the deflection, Ball reestablishes himself in bounds prior to touching the ball.
Lowry (TOR) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Rozier (CHA).
Rozier (CHA) does not extend his arm or deliver contact to Lowry (TOR) to dislodge him from his legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt.
During the rebound, Ball (CHA) briefly grasps and releases Anunoby's (TOR) jersey shorts and the contact does not affect his ability to tip the ball.
Bridges (CHA) contests the play at the basket by Boucher (TOR) and marginal contact occurs to Boucher's arm on his follow-through after the ball goes through the basket.
Siakam (TOR) and Washington (CHA) engage and disengage off-ball.
Boucher (TOR) straddles the lane line and is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Graham (CHA) jumps to make the pass and goes to, but not through Lowry's (TOR) space.
Siakam (TOR) extends his arm out and makes contact to Washington's (CHA) head prior to deflecting the pass away.
Lowry (TOR) slightly extends his forearm as marginal contact occurs to Bridges' (CHA) side, and the contact does not dislodge him from his legal guarding position.
Siakam (TOR) pushes Rozier (CHA) during rebounding and causes him to undercut Boucher (TOR).  As a result of the contact, Boucher makes contact to Washington's (CHA) head.
Bridges (CHA) commits a take foul on VanVleet (TOR).
Anunoby (TOR) could be deemed to be in the lane for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Washington (CHA) legally contests the play at the basket by Boucher (TOR) and blocks the shot attempt.
Prior to the jump shot, Graham (CHA) steps out of bounds.
During the shot, Lowry (TOR) maintains a legal guarding position and removes his hand from Graham's (CHA) body prior to the start of his upward shooting motion.
